name: autohide the menu & sidebar [The Guardian]
description: Hides The Guardian's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info:
The thin vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, sidebar, and footer. Mouse over them to restore the element.
